_sText:
I liked this map a lot, but I don't play bhop/xc in csgo, so I wanted to port it to cs:s. 

[Original Map](http://csgo.gamebanana.com/maps/184831 "")

I modified the map very slightly, the biggest thing I added was anti-prespeed triggers for the longjumps, but other than that, the gameplay is exactly the same as in the original. Also added zone markers for the start/end zones, since I removed the buttons.
